        Returns:
        csrfCookie

      • isValidClassYear

        public static boolean isValidClassYear(java.lang.String classYear)
        Validates class year when creating classes. Class year should be YY/YY, eg 11/12. So the first year must be less than the second.
        Parameters:
        classYear - Class Year in YY/YY format, eg 11/12.
        Returns:
        Boolean value stating weather or not these supplied attributes make a valid class year

        public static boolean validateAdminSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession ses)

      • validateTokens

        public static boolean validateTokens(javax.servlet.http.Cookie cookieToken,
                     java.lang.Object requestToken)
        This method compares the two submitted tokens after ensuring they are not null and not empty.
        Parameters:
        cookieToken - CSRF cookie Token
        requestToken - CSRF request Token
        Returns:
        A boolean value stating weather or not the tokens are valid
